en-US.title: Settings
en-US.midiDescription: Note: you can record incoming MIDI notes straight into the patterns by clicking the record button in the transport controls. You can also record live during playback, but keep in mind that the notes will be quantized to the step resolution of the current pattern.
en-US.noMidiDevices: There are no available MIDI devices. Attach a new/different device and try again.
en-US.midiFailure: MIDI Unavailable, Efflux could not connect to MIDI device(s)
en-US.midiEnabled: Listening to MIDI messages coming from {device}
